summary: Project includes mobile crop handling and a right-to-left audio text marquee animation; user requests adjusting the marquee speed.

existing_features.title: Adjust the scrolling speed of the right-to-left track title marquee so it scrolls at the new desired rate across the app (Mini Player and Now Playing screen). Update the default `speedPxPerSecond` used by `TrackTitleMarquee` and ensure the resulting animation duration changes accordingly while keeping the direction right-to-left.
